item.title: Hate for Hate
item.description: Hate for Hate is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Domenico Paolella.

item.title: Arizona Colt
item.description: Arizona Colt, also known as The Man from Nowhere, is a Spaghetti Western directed by Michele Lupo and starring Giuliano Gemma, Fernando Sancho and Corinne Marchand.

item.title: For One Thousand Dollars Per Day
item.description: For One Thousand Dollars Per Day is a 1966 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western film directed by Silvio Amadio. The title song ""My Gun is Fast" is performed by Bobby Solo.

item.title: Long Live Your Death
item.description: Long Live Your Death is a 1971 Italian/Spanish/German international co-production spaghetti western/ action comedy film directed by Duccio Tessari. The film is mostly a send up of "political" Spaghetti Westerns, like A Professional Gun and Compañeros.

item.title: Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West
item.description: Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West is a 1964 Italian spaghetti western directed by Mario Costa.
